name: Rocket Dodger (Atari 2600 style)
description:
Rocket Dodger

In this game you play as a person who finds himself having to dodge missiles and rockets whilst in the middle of nowhere. 

To dodge the rockets you use the WASD keys and arrow keys to dodge the rockets and missiles. When it hits you it's game over. 

Thanks for playing and have fun!
Any feedback or comments about the game is helpful/encouraged

Game art and code made by: liam.x220
